text: Lawrence Raymond Leach (June 18, 1936 â€“ May 8, 2018) was a Canadian ice hockey centre. He played three seasons for the Boston Bruins. He played from 1953 to 1973. Leach was born in Lloydminster, Saskatchewan. Leach died on May 8, 2018 in Victoria, British Columbia at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Boston Bruins players Category:Canadian ice hockey centres Category:Sportspeople from Saskatchewan
title: Larry Leach
